p: Antifungal activity tests were performed for Origanum vulgare ssp. hirtum (oregano), Thymus capitatus (thyme), and Satureja thymbra (Satureja). Samples were provided by the Hellenic Agricultural Organizationâ€”Demeter, Plant Breeding and Genetic Resources Institute, (Thessaloniki, Greece). The aerial parts (flowers and leaves) of aromatic plants were collected in summer 2014, dried in the shade at ambient temperature, and ground into powder to pass through a 0.5 mm sieve as reported in [ 20].
